text: Nikolaos Pananos (Greek: Νικόλαος Πανανός), born on 29 March 1968 in Athens, is a Greek boccia player with a Paralympic boccia classification of BC3. His specific disability is cerebral palsy. He won the gold medal during the 2012 Summer Paralympics in BC3 mixed pairs along with Maria-Eleni Kordali and Grigorios Polychronidis. Hellenic Paralympic Committee page In the 2016 Summer Paralympics he won the bronze medal at the same event. == References == Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Boccia players at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Boccia players at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Greece Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic boccia players of Greece Category:Paralympic medalists in boccia
title: Nikolaos Pananos
